formattedAddress: 1535 2nd Ave Ground Floor, New York, NY 10075, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1535 2nd Ave Ground Floor, New York, NY 10075, USA

originalText.text: I was recommended to Dr. Sebastian Lighvani by my internist who I hold in high regard. Dr. Lighvani was personable, professional and very knowledgable. I was extremely pleased. He gave me a thorough exam and took time to find out about my medical history. His staff is wonderful and professional as well and his office is clean and beautifully appointed. His advise was extremely helpful as was his follow up. It's nice, in this day and age, when everyone is in such a hurry to be treated by a doctor who cares greatly, listens and is great at what he does.

originalText.text: Dr. Lighvani is extremely warm and detail oriented. His staff is very kind/caring, especially the nurses that give allergy shots and the women at the front desk! I couldn’t recommend more. They have great options to speed up your allergy shot treatment.

text.text: Dr. Lighvani is extremely warm and detail oriented. His staff is very kind/caring, especially the nurses that give allergy shots and the women at the front desk! I couldn’t recommend more. They have great options to speed up your allergy shot treatment.

originalText.text:
Incredible doctor. I have had several ENT/Allergists, and none have taken a bigger interest in my sinus and pulmonary health.
He is incredibly versed in treatments of chronic conditions, as evident in me.

To appreciate Dr. Lighvani you need to understand people, how we are all different, but the same.
That is his approach as well .

I recently recommend my sister to go there, and will happily send them more clients as they get the best treatment one can get.

originalText.text: Dr Lighvani is amazing! To start, he is a genius -- unsurprising given his training at both Johns Hopkins and Mayo Clinic. Saw him after seeing other doctors that were actually making my symptoms worse. He quickly reversed that trend and then identified what was really wrong and now has me on the right path where I have improved.

originalText.text: I have never dealt with a more disinterested doctor. No communication, no eye contact. His staff is efficient and nice.  Please use a different doctor who cares for more than just raking in fees
